comment._content:
(Right top) The Peninsula Hong Kong Hotel, Tsim Sha Tsiu, Kowloon, Hong Kong 香港尖沙咀半島酒店 (右一)

(Right 2nd) Salisbury Road, Tsim Sha Tsiu Train Station, Clock Tower & The Peninsula Hong Kong, Tsim Sha Tsiu, Kowloon, Hong Kong 香港九龍梳士巴利道, 背景左為尖沙咀火車站及鐘樓, 右為半島酒店,  (右二)
